text: Blondie is an American sitcom that ran on NBC for one season and 26 episodes. It ran from 4 January, 1957 to 5 July, 1957. It starred Arthur Lake, Pamela Britton, Ann Barnes, Harold Peary, Elvia Allman and was based on comic strip series. ==Other websites== * Category:1950s American television series Category:1957 television series debuts Category:1957 television series endings Category:1957 disestablishments Category:American sitcoms Category:Black and white television series Category:NBC network series Category:English-language television programs
title: Blondie (1957 TV series)
